snippet: Thanks in part to social media, the casual fan is taking an active interest in how equine athletes are treated. Their concerns are compelling some forces within the sport to make reforms.
abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column applauds casual racing fans for taking active interest in how equine athletes are treated; say their concerns have compelled some forces within industry to make reforms with regards to doping and other issues.
lead_paragraph: Thanks in part to social media, the casual fan is taking an active interest in how equine athletes are treated. Their concerns are compelling some forces within the sport to make reforms.
